text: Fallen Heroes may refer to: *Fallen Heroes (film), a 2007 Italian crime-drama film *"Fallen Heroes" (Homicide: Life on the Street) *Fallen Heroes (novel), a Deep Space Nine novel *Fallen Heroes (Album), an Album by the supergroup Metal Allegiance ==See also== *Fallen Heroes Act, an act of the U.S. Congress * Fallen Hero (TV series), a 1978 British television series *Fallen Hero, an episode of the TV series Star Trek: Enterprise. *Tragic Hero, a related narrative concept of a hero that, because of determined circumstances, is prone to fall to evil. One example of such character is Anakin Skywalker from the Star Wars series.
title: Fallen Heroes
